
                            
                            <p>买了十颗兰花，一个是嗯兰原产地的5颗，过得很好，还在龅牙长新苗，宿迁的5颗快死完了，以后再也不买宿迁产地的苗木了！都是垃圾货！！！ <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/12/111853gxxtd7tv2x8ex445.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/12/111853gxxtd7tv2x8ex445.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">花草瓜果树苗网上一买，就是宿迁发货</p><p></p>
                            <p>
                                
                            </p>
